function_reachability: Is it impossible for function 'func2' to reach function 'main'?
Is it impossible for function 'func2' to reach function 'func1'?
Is there a call path from function 'main' to function 'func3'?
loop_reachability: Can the loop with condition 'i < (N)' be skipped entirely?
Is the loop with condition 'i < (N)' always executed?
Is it possible that the loop with condition '0' is never executed?
Is the loop with condition '0' always executed?
dominators: Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'i < (N)' without passing through its header block?
Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition '0' without passing through its header block?
data_dependency: Is variable 'i (line 3)' used after its definition?
Does the value assigned to 'i (line 4)' affect subsequent computations?
liveness: Is variable 'i' live at the end of function 'func2'?
Does variable 'i' remain in use at the end of function 'func1'?
